overview: Introducing the funniest Irish-Iranian comedian (from Middlesbrough) around! The exuberant, affable Patrick Monahan was the winner of ITV’s Show Me The Funny, emerging triumphant in a hotly-contested live final in which he won the public vote and the plaudits of the judges.  This show, recorded live at London’s Bloomsbury Theatre, finds Patrick at his hyperactive, charming and freewheeling best - spinning laugh-along yarns and engaging effortlessly and hilariously with his audience.
title: Patrick Monahan: Live
